name: Real RC Flight Simulator 2017
description:
Are your ready to a new experience in Remote Control for mobile? Real RC Flight Simulator 2017 is the most epic and realistic radio & remote control simulator in the mobile scene!

In this amazing Real Remote Flight Simulator you will have the opportunity to fly with the most epic helicopters, airplanes, fighters and jets of the world!

Now your dream can become true with Real RC Flight Simulator 2017!

MAIN FEATURES:

- 36 different aircrafts (included helicopters, fighters, airplanes and jets)!
- Drones & Gliders!
- 7 different maps!
- More than 1000 missions!
- 3 levels of difficulty!
- 4 different game modes:
- Free Flight Mode!
- Racing Mode!
- Freestyle Mode!
- Mission Mode!

EXTRA FEATURES:

- Highly detailed scenario and obstacles
- Highly detailed radio controller
- Radio control accuracy
- Realistic radio control
- Simulator conditions accuracy

Be welcomed to the best radio Sim: Real RC Flight Simulator 2017!
Contact us for any support or feedback: support@thetis.mobi
